description: This file defines the GameState class, which manages the state of a Tic-Tac-Toe game, including the game board, current player, game status, and methods to make moves, reset the game, and check for a winner.

classes.name: GameState
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass managing the Tic-Tac-Toe game state, providing methods for game logic and state updates.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game board, current player, game status, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: makeMove
methods.description: Attempts to make a move at a given index, checks for win/draw conditions, updates game state, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Internal method that checks if there's a winner based on current board state and returns the winning line if any.

methods.name: _isDraw
methods.description: Internal method that checks if the game is a draw (all cells filled with no winner).
